name: Horror High
storyline:
There is a KILLER on the loose in CREEPERTIN and the entire town has been evacuated except for eight teenaged, high school stereotypes. These TEENs have one objective only: SURVIVE. The KILLER'S objective is to kill, duh. The KILLER will do everything in their power to cut of the Escape Routes and turn the TEENS into unfortunate victims.

The TEENS will have to put their differences aside and work together or fight head-on if they wish to escape the town with their lives. This is a game of the hunter and the hunted, kill or be killed, life or death.

This is HORROR HIGH.
summary:
HORROR HIGH is a '90s horror/comedy 4v1, competitive survival, open-map RPG.
Up to four high school stereotypes face iconic monsters as they attempt to survive and escape.

Journey around the expansive town of Creepertin as you gave weapons, health, flashlights, and key items you'll need to rebuild long-abandoned vehicles and flee to safety. Or, team up and try to take down your pursuer!
